title: What should I write if I am going to send a letter to BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m assuming you know the address, rules and all that. If not, check out this link: Sani Stevens's post in ARMY Room ᴮᴱ ⁷ It covers most of it. You can write anything you’d like, but of course be respectful to them and don’t go acting like a saseang. You could write how they have helped you (love yourself, or anything in life really), why you love them, how you became an ARMY, honestly just anything you want them to know. I’m sure they’ll appreciate your letter! I’m still not entirely sure if they read all the fanmail, though, but yours just might be seen :) Hope I answered your question! MXue
